dialog.speaker: Mayor
dialog.line: I am very happy that you want to be the new innkeeper of this old tavern.

dialog.speaker: Mayor
dialog.line: Legend has it that the tavern's dungeon is the best in the land.

dialog.speaker: Mayor
dialog.line: Some people even say that the dungeon is different every time they come to visit.

dialog.speaker: Mayor
dialog.line: No idea how that would work but whatever makes the poeple pay the entrance fee, right? Ha ha ha!

dialog.speaker: Mayor
dialog.line: Anyhow. The previous owner sold a bunch of weapons and other goods to the dungeoneers to make ends meet.

dialog.speaker: Mayor
dialog.line: Not sure where he got them to be honest.

dialog.speaker: Mayor
dialog.line: If I were you, I would take a look inside your dungeon. Maybe you can pick up some of the loot you customers left in there.

dialog.speaker: Mayor
dialog.line: On that point, make sure you pay your rent in time. We don't want to have to go looking for a new tavern keeper again, right? Ha ha ha!

dialog.speaker: Mayor
dialog.line: With that I'll leave you to it, <name>.

dialog.speaker: Mayor
dialog.line: Ahh! Before I forget, make sure to sign your lease! He he.
